name: arwrcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, ccat))
-| wss(cdm(carw), ccat)
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cdm(carw)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 ∈ Cat)
⊣ dom(Arrow)⊆ Cat
⊣ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 ∈ dom(Arrow))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, ccat))
-| wss(cdm(carw), ccat)
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cdm(carw)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 ∈ Cat)
⊣ dom(Arrow)⊆ Cat
⊣ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 ∈ dom(Arrow))

body.origin:
|- wss(cdm(carw), ccat)
-| wceq(carw, cmpt(hs0, ccat, cuni(crn(cfv(choma, cv(hs0))))))
-| diffsc(hs0, ccat)
body.pretty:
⊢ dom(Arrow)⊆ Cat
⊣ Arrow =(hs0 ∈ Cat ↦ ⋃ ran((HomA ` hs0)))
⊣ d(hs0, Cat)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, ccat))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cdm(carw)))
-| wceq(carw, cmpt(hs0, ccat, cuni(crn(cfv(choma, cv(hs0))))))
-| diffsc(hs0, ccat)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 ∈ Cat)
⊣ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 ∈ dom(Arrow))
⊣ Arrow =(hs0 ∈ Cat ↦ ⋃ ran((HomA ` hs0)))
⊣ d(hs0, Cat)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, ccat))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cdm(carw)))
-| diffsc(hs0, ccat)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 ∈ Cat)
⊣ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 ∈ dom(Arrow))
⊣ d(hs0, Cat)

stmt.origin: eleq2s(c0, c1, cfv(carw, c2), wcel(c2, cdm(carw)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cdm(carw)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(carw, c2)), wcel(c2, cdm(carw)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(carw, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 ∈ dom(Arrow))
⊣ (c0 ∈(Arrow ` c2)→ c2 ∈ dom(Arrow))
⊣ c1 =(Arrow ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, ccat))
-| diffsc(hs0, ccat)
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(carw, c2)), wcel(c2, cdm(carw)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(carw, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 ∈ Cat)
⊣ d(hs0, Cat)
⊣ (c0 ∈(Arrow ` c2)→ c2 ∈ dom(Arrow))
⊣ c1 =(Arrow ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, ccat))
-| diffsc(hs0, ccat)
-| wceq(c1, cfv(carw, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 ∈ Cat)
⊣ d(hs0, Cat)
⊣ c1 =(Arrow ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, ccat))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(carw, c2))

comment: The first component of an arrow is the ordered pair of domain and codomain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
